title: Nazarene Student Advantage Scholarship
Description:: The Nazarene Student Advantage Scholarship is available to full-time undergraduate students at Olivet Nazarene University.  You must provide documentation of regular attendance within the Nazarene Church in order to qualify for this award.

title: Nazarene Pastor or Missionary Scholarship
Description:: The Nazarene Pastor or Missionary Scholarship is available to full-time undergraduate students at Olivet Nazarene University.  You must provide documentation of your parent's full-time service in the Nazarene Church in order to qualify for this award.

title: Academic Grant
Description:: The Academic Scholarship is available to full-time undergraduate students at Olivet Nazarene University.  You must meet both the minimum GPA and test score requirements listed on the sponsor's website to be eligible for this renewable award.

title: Music, Art and Theater Merit Scholarship
Description:: The Music, Art and Theater Merit Scholarship is available to full-time undergraduate students at Olivet Nazarene University.  You must demonstrate excellence in one of these disciplines in order to qualify for this award.

title: Box Engineering Diversity Scholarship
Description:: The Box Engineering Diversity Scholarship is available to minority, female, and LGBT students.  You must be pursuing a degree in computer science or a closely related field to be eligible for this award.

title: Eraser Clinic Laser Tattoo Removal Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Nursing, Medicine, Natural Sciences, Applied Sciences, Engineering
Description:: The Eraser Clinic Laser Tattoo Removal Scholarship is available to students enrolled at an accredited college or university.  You must be pursuing a degree in nursing, medicine, natural sciences, applied sciences, engineering, or a related field and have a minimum 3.0 GPA to qualify for this award.  Additionally, you must submit a 200 to 400 word piece that expresses your opinion of the societal impact of laser tattoo removal, using the Eraser Clinic website as a resource.

title: National Hispanic Health Professional Student Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Dentistry, Medicine, Nursing, Pharmacy, Public Health, Policy
Description:: The National Hispanic Health Professional Student Scholarship is available to full - time students enrolled in dental, medical, nursing, pharmacy, public health, and policy schools.  You must exhibit exceptional academic performance, documented leadership activities, and have a commitment to a career providing healthcare services to the Hispanic community in the U.S. to be considered for this award.

title: Somos Foundation Scholarship
Description:: The Somos Foundation Scholarship is available to students of Hispanic/Latino descent.  You must be a resident of Utah to be eligible for this award.  Also, you must demonstrate leadership in school, community, and / or other service organizations that promote, enhance, or strengthen diversity

title: Beautiful Minds Challenge
Description:: The Beautiful Minds Challenge is available to students between the ages of 15 and 19 who are not yet enrolled in college full - time, and would like to attend Marlboro College in Vermont.  To enter, you must submit a creative digital documentation that answers the following prompt:  "Be the change. Document the effect."  You must also include a cover letter that explains what you learned as you worked on the challenge.

title: Digital Marketing Scholarship
Description:: The Digital Marketing Scholarship is available to students enrolled at an accredited college or university.  You must be studying marketing, commerce, business or IT and submit an essay of 500 words or less to qualify for this award.

title: Veterans Scholarship
Description:: The Veterans Scholarship is available to full-time students attending Olivet College.  You must be a veteran with qualifying days of active duty service; active duty military; current members of the National Guard or any branch of the U.S. military reserve who qualify for VA benefits and/or military education assistance to be eligible for this award.  Spouses and legal dependents who provide proof of eligibility qualify for the scholarship, as well.

Provided By:: Alvin Community College - Financial Aid Office
title: Debbie Granberry Scholarship
Description:: The Debbie Granberry Scholarship is available to students completing 24 hours at the end of the first year at Alvin Community College.  You must be majoring in nursing or education, enrolled in 12 hours each semester, minimum GPA of 2.5 and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Alvin Community College - Financial Aid Office
title: Hawkins Family Scholarship
Description:: The Hawkins Family Scholarship is available to students completing 24 hours at the end of the first year at Alvin Community College.  You must be majoring in in process technology, business, or engineering, enrolled in 12 hours each semester and minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Golden Door Scholars Award
Description:: The Golden Door Scholars Award is available to undocumented students with DACA status.  You must have a minimum 3.0 GPA to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Alvin Community College - Financial Aid Office
title: Mike Merkel Scholarship
Description:: The Mike Merkel Scholarship is available to students completing 24 hours at the end of the first year at Alvin Community College.  You must be majoring in criminal justice, enrolled in 12 hours each semester, minimum GPA of 2.0 and demonstrate financial need to be considered for this award.

Provided By:: Alvin Community College - Financial Aid Office
title: Myrtle Isensee Scholarship
Description:: The Myrtle Isensee Scholarship is available to students at Alvin Community College.  You must be majoring in drafting to be eligible for this award.

title: Sixt Scholars Program
Description:: The Sixt Scholars Program is open to graduating high school seniors who are planning to enroll full - time at a two - or four - year university.  You must have a minimum 3.7 GPA and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: Science Ambassador Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Science, Technology, Engineering and Math Fields
Description:: The Science Ambassador Scholarship is open to women who are seeking an undergraduate degree in a STEM field.  You must submit a video of yourself explaining a topic in science that you are passionate about in order to be considered for this award.  Ideal candidates will be ambassadors for their field that are passionate about their discoveries and who will share their excitement with others.

title: The Art Institutes Scholarship Competition
Description:: The Art Institutes Scholarship Competition is available to high school senior students at an Art Institute location.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to retain the scholarship.

title: DECA Scholarship
Description:: The DECA Scholarship is available to high school senior students at an Art Institute location.  You must be a present member of DECA to be eligible for this award. Selection is based on activity in the organization, recommendation from a DECA advisor and high school record.  Winners must maintain a minimum GPA of 2.5 to retain the scholarship.

title: Leo McMullin Scholarship
Description:: The Leo McMullin Scholarship is available to upper level students at Lander University.  You must be majoring in business administration with an interest in a career in marketing, and have a minimum 3.0 GPA to be eligible for this award.

title: Ed Troublefield Scholarship
Description:: The Ed Troublefield Scholarship is available to full - time students majoring in business administration at Lander University.

title: Sharon Jones Williams Scholarship
Description:: The Sharon Jones Williams Scholarship is available to non - traditional female students at Lander University.  You must be majoring in education or business administration to qualify for this award.

title: Augustana Academic Scholarships
Description:: The Augustana Academic Scholarships are available to students at Augustana University.  You must demonstrate academic achievement to be eligible for this award.

title: Augustana Grant
Description:: The Augustana Grant is available to incoming freshmen at Augustana University.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: Diversity Scholarship - Augustana University
Description:: The Diversity Scholarship is available to full - time students at Augustana University.  You must bring diversity to the campus to be considered for this award.
